column1: The measured sector (used in productivity statistics) is ANZSIC divisions A to K and P from 1978, and includes divisions LC (Business services) and Q (Personal and other community services) from 1996 onwards.
The former measured sector (used in productivity statistics) is ANZSIC divisions A to K and P.
